items.name: Nairobi National Park
items.description: Home to a wide variety of wildlife, including lions, giraffes, and rhinos.

items.name: KICC
items.description: A landmark building and the hub for conferences and events in Kenya.

items.name: Maasai Mara
items.description: Famous for the annual wildebeest migration and abundant wildlife.

items.name: Mount Kenya
items.description: The second-highest mountain in Africa, offering stunning views and hiking trails.

items.name: Lamu Old Town
items.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site with rich Swahili culture and architecture.

items.name: Diani Beach
items.description: Known for its pristine white sand beaches and crystal-clear waters.

items.name: Hell's Gate National Park
items.description: Famous for its geothermal activity and scenic landscapes.

items.name: Lake Nakuru
items.description: Known for its flamingos and diverse birdlife.
